name: Grey Man
description:
Grey Man was made to teach young people about making music & sound for games!

A lot of the audio was created by a group of young people aged 13 - 26 from the Dumfries & Galloway area in Scotland, to help them learn about creating interactive media.

Their music & sound sets the story for Grey Man, a curious being who explores its surroundings to understand itself. 

Grey Man was designed by composer/sound designer Luci Holland: www.luciholland.com

--

Left arrow/Right arrow = Left and right
Up arrow = Jump
Left click = Interact
R = Reset platforms
